english.segment1: Father do you hear me. 'Cause I know I hear you. I waited for the answers. While sittin' here in my room. I danced to the rhythm. And moved by myself. No one could see through me. Or hear the words I felt
english.segment2: Chorus: Little voice inside keeps calling. Little voice inside it cries. Little voice inside keeps calling. Little voice - oh won't you be my guide
english.segment3: I sometimes hear the echo. The pattern of my cry. I sometimes feel the pulling. From a sound that's deep inside. Quiet are the whispers. And silent are my eyes. No one hears but me. That little voice inside, you see.
